title: Golden Globes 2025 live updates: No wins for India as All We Imagine As Light gets snubbed in both categories - Hindustan Times
summary:

The 2025 Golden Globes saw significant recognition for various films, but India's entry, All We Imagine As Light, left the ceremony without any wins after being nominated in two categories.

  • The ceremony took place on January 5, airing live and attracting significant viewership.
  • Despite nominations, India did not secure any awards.

title: Chandramukhi makers send legal notice to Nayanthara – Here is what happened - 123telugu
summary:
Chandramukhi Producers File Legal Notice Against Nayanthara

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: 123 Telugu

Nayanthara, known as the “Lady Superstar,” is facing legal complications following the release of her wedding documentary, Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale, on Netflix.

  • Dhanush has filed a lawsuit against Nayanthara, her husband Vignesh Shivan, and Netflix for using copyrighted material from his film.
  • The demand for compensation is set at Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of a few seconds of footage.
  • The producers of Chandramukhi have sent a legal notice demanding Rs. 5 crore for using a clip from their film without permission.
  • Fans are eagerly waiting for Nayanthara's response to these legal challenges.
Dhanush demands Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of his clip from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan.

This situation is developing, and updates will follow as Nayanthara's response becomes available.
newTitle: Chandramukhi Producers File Legal Notice Against Nayanthara

WWE RAW is all set to make its Netflix debut this week, marking a historic moment for the show known for its iconic moments over the past three decades.

The highly-anticipated trailer of Himesh Reshammiya starrer Badass Ravi Kumar has been unveiled and is taking social media by storm. This retro action musical is a tribute to classic Bollywood, featuring high-octane action and memorable characters.

  • The trailer showcases Himesh Reshammiya as a chainsaw-wielding hero fighting villains.
  • Prabhu Deva plays the main antagonist, while Kriti Kulhari is the female lead.

  • Directed by Keith Gomes, the film is set for release on February 7, 2025.

Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop? - DNA India
summary:
Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop?

Publication Date: January 5, 2024

Source: DNA India

An adaptation of Atlee's 2016 Tamil hit Theri, Baby John has turned out to be one of the biggest Bollywood flops.

  • Released on December 25, 2023, Baby John features Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, and Wamiqa Gabbi.
  • The film earned Rs 37.70 crore net in India in its first 11 days.
  • On its 12th day, it collected just 90 lakh, totaling Rs 38.60 crore.
  • Worldwide, the film has grossed close to Rs 60 crore against a massive budget of Rs 180 crore.
  • Placed among the biggest Bollywood flops of 2024.
“The moviegoers are choosing Pushpa 2: The Rule and the animated musical Mufasa: The Lion King over Baby John in this festive season.”

In conclusion, Baby John has failed to attract audiences and has been overshadowed by other films during its release.
newTitle: Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop?
